welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Tung Chung Hang
welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Tung Chung Hang, where the bustling city meets the serene beauty of nature. From its stunning skyline to its rich cultural heritage, this vibrant city has something for everyone. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that San Tung Chung Hang has to offer.

restaurants.name: Tsui Wah Restaurant (翠華餐廳)
restaurants.description: Tsui Wah Restaurant (翠華餐廳) is a hong kong restaurant located in San Tung Chung Hang.
restaurants.address: 1/F, Fu Tung Plaza, 33 Tat Tung Rd

restaurants.name: Sushi Take-Out (爭鮮外帶寿司)
restaurants.description: Sushi Take-Out (爭鮮外帶寿司) is a sushi restaurant located in San Tung Chung Hang.
restaurants.address: Shop TUG 13, MTR Tung Chung Station

restaurants.name: Oolaa
restaurants.description: Oolaa is a comfort food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Olea
restaurants.description: Olea is a mediterranean restaurant located in San Tung Chung Hang.
restaurants.address: Novotel Citygate Hong Kong, 51 Man Tung Rd

restaurants.name: Pret A Manger
restaurants.description: Pret A Manger is a sandwich spot located in the city.
restaurants.address: Shop 18, G/F, Citygate Outlets, 20 Tat Tung Rd, Hong Kong

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Hong Kong International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Hong Kong International Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy 2 hours of free WiFi throughout the airport.
